instruction:
Consider the following description: A computer process that is configured to execute continuously in the background and perform system tasks, in some cases before any user has logged in

To which MITRE datasource the given description refers
output: The MITRE ATT&CK datasource that is related to the given description is: 'Service (DS0019)'

parsed_raw_data.question:
Consider the following description: A computer process that is configured to execute continuously in the background and perform system tasks, in some cases before any user has logged in

To which MITRE datasource the given description refers
parsed_raw_data.answer: The MITRE ATT&CK datasource that is related to the given description is: 'Service (DS0019)'

instruction: Which Mitre ATT&CK datasource meets the following description: A computer program that operates or controls a particular type of device that is attached to a computer. Provides a software interface to hardware devices, enabling operating systems and other computer programs to access hardware functions without needing to know precise details about the hardware being used?
output: The datasource that meets the above description is Driver (DS0027)

parsed_raw_data.question: Which Mitre ATT&CK datasource meets the following description: A computer program that operates or controls a particular type of device that is attached to a computer. Provides a software interface to hardware devices, enabling operating systems and other computer programs to access hardware functions without needing to know precise details about the hardware being used
parsed_raw_data.answer: The datasource that meets the above description is Driver (DS0027)

instruction: Which Mitre ATT&CK datasource meets the following description: A network security system, running locally on an endpoint or remotely as a service (ex: cloud environment), that monitors and controls incoming/outgoing network traffic based on predefined rules
output: The datasource that meets the above description is Firewall (DS0018)

parsed_raw_data.question: Which Mitre ATT&CK datasource meets the following description: A network security system, running locally on an endpoint or remotely as a service (ex: cloud environment), that monitors and controls incoming/outgoing network traffic based on predefined rules
parsed_raw_data.answer: The datasource that meets the above description is Firewall (DS0018)

instruction: Which Mitre datasource does the below description refers to: A malicious online profile representing a user commonly used by adversaries to social engineer or otherwise target victims

instruction: Which Mitre datasource meets the following description: Data object storage infrastructure hosted on-premise or by third-party providers, made available to users through network connections and/or APIs?
output: The datasource that meets the above description is Cloud Storage (DS0010)

parsed_raw_data.question: Which Mitre datasource meets the following description: Data object storage infrastructure hosted on-premise or by third-party providers, made available to users through network connections and/or APIs
parsed_raw_data.answer: The datasource that meets the above description is Cloud Storage (DS0010)

instruction: To which Mitre datasource does the following description refers: Automated tasks that can be executed at a specific time or on a recurring schedule running in the background (ex: Cron daemon, task scheduler, BITS)
output: The datasource that refer to the above description is Scheduled Job (DS0003)

parsed_raw_data.question: To which Mitre datasource does the following description refers: Automated tasks that can be executed at a specific time or on a recurring schedule running in the background (ex: Cron daemon, task scheduler, BITS)
parsed_raw_data.answer: The datasource that refer to the above description is Scheduled Job (DS0003)

instruction: To which Mitre datasource does the following description refers: Executable files consisting of one or more shared classes and interfaces, such as portable executable (PE) format binaries/dynamic link libraries (DLL), executable and linkable format (ELF) binaries/shared libraries, and Mach-O format binaries/shared libraries?
output: The datasource that refer to the above description is Module (DS0011)

parsed_raw_data.answer: The datasource that refer to the above description is Module (DS0011)

instruction:
Consider the following description: Infrastructure, platforms, or software that are hosted on-premise or by third-party providers, made available to users through network connections and/or APIs

To which MITRE datasource the given description refers
output: The MITRE ATT&CK datasource that is related to the given description is: 'Cloud Service (DS0025)'

To which MITRE datasource the given description refers

instruction: To which Mitre datasource does the following description refers: Data transmitted across a network (ex: Web, DNS, Mail, File, etc.), that is either summarized (ex: Netflow) and/or captured as raw data in an analyzable format (ex: PCAP)?
output: The datasource that refer to the above description is Network Traffic (DS0029)

parsed_raw_data.answer: The datasource that refer to the above description is Network Traffic (DS0029)

instruction: Which Mitre datasource meets the following description: Credential material, such as session cookies or tokens, used to authenticate to web applications and services
output: The datasource that meets the above description is Web Credential (DS0006)
